summary: This is a modular armor set based on my DMRA Oblivion body mods.You can wear the different pieces as you choose, from nude to moderate. The more pieces you wear the higher your armor rating. Two versions, one with High Heels.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Deathscream Armor
Author: Edhildil
4,11,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This is a modular armor set based on my DMRA Oblivion body mods.You can wear

the different pieces as you choose, from nude to moderate. The more pieces you

wear the higher your armor rating.

Craftable under Leather catagory, improvable at a workbench.

I made two versions, one with High Heels, the other without High Heels.

The world model for the armor pieces looks like a book, and acts like one.

That means if you drop one of the items it will look like a book and it will

look like a book in your inventory. Why? Because it is funny.

Pieces include:

Top
Panty
Gloves
Sandals
Hooves (High Heel version only)
Leggings
Belt with Bags
Bones
Nude Body (Based off my Oblivion DMRA mods)

mods in screenshots include:

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]



[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)


HDT High Heels system for High Heel version.

 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete Data_meshes_armor_edhildil_deathscream folder
Delete Data_textures_armor_edhildil_deathscream folder
Delete Edhildils Deathscream Armor esp. file


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Edhildil for the armor
 

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed

in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so

I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
